examples: Well, I've never ridden a motorbike before, so here goes!

examples: Leave the motorway at Junction 7.

and she's the businesswoman I want to be.

examples: The corridor led into a spacious living room.

examples: Kate is willing to pay full price for an expensive handbag, but I just can't wrap my head around that.
